name: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana
short_description: Financial inclusion program for bank accounts
full_description: PMJDY provides access to banking, savings, remittance, credit, insurance and pension services to excluded populations.
eligibility_text: Any adult without an existing bank account can apply.

name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
full_description: Income support to landholding farmer families to supplement their financial needs.
eligibility_text: Small and marginal farmers; check official site for details.

name: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA)
short_description: Wage employment guarantee for rural households
full_description: Provides at least 100 days of guaranteed wage employment in a financial year to every rural household whose adult members volunteer to do unskilled manual work.
eligibility_text: Rural households; applicants should register at local Gram Panchayat.

name: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (PMUY)
short_description: Free LPG connections for women from BPL households
full_description: Provides support for LPG connections to women from Below Poverty Line households to ensure clean cooking fuel.
eligibility_text: Women of BPL households; local enrollment required.

name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (PMAY)
full_description: Affordable housing scheme providing subsidies and support for eligible beneficiaries to own houses.
eligibility_text: Beneficiary categories defined by urban/rural guidelines; income caps may apply.

name: Ayushman Bharat â€“ Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PM-JAY)
short_description: Health insurance coverage for vulnerable families
full_description: Provides health cover for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization to eligible families.
eligibility_text: Households listed in SECC database or as defined by PM-JAY criteria.

name: Maharashtra - Mukhyamantri Amrutum (Sample State Welfare)
full_description: State-level welfare scheme placeholder for Maharashtra; users should verify details on the official state portal.
eligibility_text: State residents meeting scheme conditions.

name: Uttar Pradesh - State Pension Scheme (Sample)
full_description: Pension support for eligible elderly and widows in Uttar Pradesh.
eligibility_text: State residents meeting age/income criteria.

name: Karnataka - State Skill Support (Sample)
full_description: Programs to support skill development and employment in Karnataka.
eligibility_text: Residents of Karnataka meeting program criteria.

name: Tamil Nadu - Public Distribution Support (Sample)
full_description: State PDS support and allied benefits for eligible households in Tamil Nadu.
eligibility_text: PDS-eligible households in Tamil Nadu.

name: West Bengal - Student Assistance (Sample)
full_description: Scholarship and educational assistance programs in West Bengal.
eligibility_text: Students meeting state scholarship criteria.

name: Telangana - State Welfare (Sample)
full_description: Placeholder for Telangana state schemes to be verified from official portal.
eligibility_text: State residents per scheme rules.

name: Delhi - City Subsidy Programs (Sample)
full_description: Placeholder entries for Delhi schemes; verify on the Delhi government portal.
eligibility_text: Residents of Delhi per scheme criteria.

name: Maharashtra - Shramik Bandhu (Migrant Support)
short_description: Support for migrant workers in Maharashtra
full_description: Provides emergency support, temporary shelter, and assistance for migrant workers returning to or arriving in Maharashtra.
eligibility_text: Migrant workers in Maharashtra in need of emergency assistance.

name: Uttar Pradesh - Mukhyamantri Kanya Sumangala Yojana
short_description: Girl child welfare payments in UP
full_description: Cash transfer and welfare assistance for newborn girls and their education and marriage in Uttar Pradesh.
eligibility_text: Girls born to resident families in UP; registration required.

name: Karnataka - Anna Bhagya (Rice Subsidy)
short_description: Rice subsidy for eligible families in Karnataka
full_description: Provides subsidized rice to eligible families under the public distribution system in Karnataka.
eligibility_text: Households listed in state PDS database.

name: Tamil Nadu - Makkalai Thedi Maruthuvam (Doorstep Health)
full_description: Provides doorstep primary healthcare interventions for elderly and vulnerable populations in Tamil Nadu.
eligibility_text: Residents requiring primary health support at home.

name: West Bengal - Kanyashree Prakalpa
short_description: Incentive scheme for girls' education in West Bengal
full_description: Conditional cash transfers for girls' education and empowerment to prevent early marriage.
eligibility_text: Unmarried girls aged 13-19 enrolled in school; further criteria apply.

name: Telangana - Rythu Bandhu (Farmer Support)
short_description: Investment support for farmers in Telangana
full_description: Provides direct investment support to farmers for cultivation expenses.
eligibility_text: Landholding farmers registered with state agriculture department.

name: Delhi - AAP Mohalla Clinics (Primary Care)
short_description: Free primary healthcare at neighbourhood clinics
full_description: Provides free primary healthcare services through local Mohalla Clinics across Delhi.
eligibility_text: Open to all residents for primary care services.

name: Maharashtra - Shala Praveshotsav Support
full_description: Assistance and mobilisation support for school enrollment drives under Maharashtra education initiatives.
eligibility_text: Children of school-going age; caregivers may register for support camps.

name: Maharashtra - Chief Minister Kisan Assistance
full_description: State-level financial assistance and support programs for farmers in Maharashtra.
eligibility_text: Registered farmers in Maharashtra; conditions apply per scheme.

name: Uttar Pradesh - Kisan Samman Nidhi (State Supplement)
full_description: Top-up support and state-specific farmer welfare measures in Uttar Pradesh.
eligibility_text: Registered farmers in UP under state schemes.

name: Uttar Pradesh - Student Scholarship Initiative
full_description: Scholarships and fee support for eligible students from Uttar Pradesh.
eligibility_text: Students meeting state scholarship criteria.

name: Karnataka - Gruha Jyothi (Electricity Subsidy)
full_description: State program providing subsidized electricity connections and tariffs for low-income households.
eligibility_text: Low-income households registered with state electricity department.

name: Karnataka - Yuva Skill Support
full_description: Provides subsidized skill training vouchers and placement support for youth in Karnataka.
eligibility_text: Youth residents of Karnataka aged 18-35; priorities for economically weaker sections.

name: Tamil Nadu - Amma Two Wheeler Scheme (Sample)
full_description: Assists women entrepreneurs with subsidised two-wheeler loans to support micro-enterprises.
eligibility_text: Women entrepreneurs registered under state MSME/enterprise programs.

name: Tamil Nadu - Free School Uniforms
short_description: Support for schoolchildren by providing uniforms
full_description: State program providing free school uniforms to students from low-income families.
eligibility_text: Students from eligible low-income families enrolled in state schools.

name: West Bengal - Ration Card Digitisation (State PDS)
short_description: Modernisation of PDS and e-ration services
full_description: State project to digitise ration card records and improve PDS delivery for eligible households.
eligibility_text: Households enrolled in the state PDS system.

name: Telangana - Mission Bhageeratha (Safe Drinking Water)
full_description: State initiative to provide safe drinking water to households across Telangana.
eligibility_text: Households in areas covered by the state mission.

name: Delhi - Skill India Centre (State Program)
full_description: Local implementation of national Skill India initiatives by the Delhi government to train and place youth.
eligibility_text: Residents of Delhi aged 18-35 seeking skill training.

name: Swachh Bharat Mission
full_description: A nationwide mission to eliminate open defecation, implement solid waste management and promote cleanliness across India.
eligibility_text: All citizens and households are beneficiaries where local programs apply.

name: Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana (PMMY)
short_description: Loans for micro and small enterprises
full_description: Provides financial support to small and micro enterprises through collateral-free loans under the MUDRA scheme.
eligibility_text: Micro and small business owners; eligibility depends on loan type (Shishu/Kishor/Tarun).

name: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PMKVY)
full_description: Short-term skill training program to enable Indian youth to take up industry-relevant skills and find employment.
eligibility_text: Youth seeking skill training; check local training centres for eligibility.

name: Atal Pension Yojana (APY)
full_description: Provides a defined pension, depending on contribution, to subscribers after they reach 60 years of age.
eligibility_text: Individuals in the unorganized sector aged between 18-40 years can enroll.

name: Pradhan Mantri Shram Yogi Maan-dhan (PM-SYM)
full_description: A pension scheme where unorganized workers contribute a small monthly amount and receive a fixed pension on attaining 60 years of age.
eligibility_text: Unorganized workers aged 18-40 with monthly income below the threshold can enroll.

name: One Nation One Ration Card (ONORC)
full_description: Allows migrant beneficiaries to access Public Distribution System (PDS) benefits across India using their ration card authenticated via Aadhaar.
eligibility_text: NFSA beneficiaries with Aadhaar-linked ration cards can avail portability.

name: Stand Up India
short_description: Loans to SC/ST and women entrepreneurs
full_description: Facilitates bank loans between 10 lakh and 1 crore to at least one Scheduled Caste/Scheduled Tribe borrower and at least one woman borrower per bank branch for setting up greenfield enterprises.
eligibility_text: SC/ST entrepreneurs and women entrepreneurs for greenfield projects are eligible.

name: Startup India
full_description: Provides funding support, tax benefits, and regulatory simplifications for startups in India.
eligibility_text: Eligible startups as per Startup India definition can register for benefits.
